steps.content: When you notice he’s doing something well, tell him about it. To get your husband thinking about you all day, try calling out something good that he does, and letting him know how much you appreciate him. I know it’s stressful, but you’re doing amazing.”

steps.title: If the lack of sex in your relationship is getting you down, it’s worth talking about.
steps.content: If the lack of sex in your relationship is getting you down, it’s worth talking about. Sit down with your husband and have an empathetic, honest chat about how you’ve been feeling.
